subject: Communication
title: Interactive Narrative: Choose Your Own Story
description: A fast breakdown of Interactive Narrative: Choose Your Own Story for builders.

hook.text: Netflix's Bandersnatch let viewers choose the plot. 1 trillion possible story combinations from one film.

buildup.text: Interactive storytelling puts the audience inside the narrative ‚Äî their choices shape the outcome.

discovery.text: Video games are the largest interactive storytelling medium. 'The Last of Us' rivals any film for emotional depth.

twist.text: But interactivity creates a paradox: more player choice means less author control over emotional impact.

climax.text: The best interactive stories create the illusion of choice while guiding players through a crafted emotional arc.

punchline.text: The future of story isn't told to you. It's told with you.

quiz.question: What paradox does interactive storytelling create?
options: More choice means less author control over emotional impact
